All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthService
Handles authentication and registration logic for users, including validation and OTP verification.
Budget
Represents a budget for a specific category.
BudgetManager
Manages budgets and spending records for different categories.
EmailValidation
Validates a user's email address format.
Expense
Represents an expense record.
ExpenseTracker
Tracks and manages a list of expenses, supporting add, update, delete, display, and categorization.
FileUserRepository
Handles persistent storage and retrieval of users using file serialization.
IncomeList
Manages a list of income entries.
InMemoryUserRepository
Provides an in-memory implementation of the UserRepository interface.
Main
The entry point for the N3N3Ta7weesh application.
PasswordValidation
Validates a user's password for length and complexity.
PhoneValidation
Validates a user's phone number format.
Reminder
Represents a reminder with a title, date, and time.
ReminderManager
Manages reminders, including creation, display, and deletion.
SpendingRecord
Represents a record of spending for a specific category.
Tracker
Interface for tracking entries such as incomes or expenses.
TrackingIncome
Represents a tracked income entry.
User
Represents a user of the N3N3 Ta7weesh application.
UsernameValidation
Validates a user's username for length and allowed characters.
UserRepository
Interface for user repository operations.
ValidationStrategy
Strategy interface for validating user fields.
